name: Baki's Bakery
description:
Hey and welcome to our Cozy Bakery. Meet awesome people and help Baki to serve their customers!

We build this Game during the Fresenius Gamejam 2023
Groupmembers: Nockcraft, Mae and Knrc

Credits:

Art:

- Room by Knrc

- Drinks by Knrc

- Priceboards by Nockcraft

- Food items by Nockcraft

- Shelf and Cat by Nockcraft

Characters:

- Quaso, Baki, Mr. Brown and Sparkle by Knrc

Writing:

- Nockcraft and Knrc

Font:

- Coffee First Font by Gassstype

- Shadows into Light by Kimberly Geswein

UI:

- Dialogue system by DoublSB

- Coffee Machine by Knrc

- Food UI by Knrc

Programming:

- Code for the most game mechanics by Knrc

Sound FX:

- Coffee Machine sounds by RosesKray
